data.description: Perl interface for multiplayer game managing
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Games::Manager is a module used for easily managing multiplayer
    games in a fast-moving interactive environment (i.e. used with IRC
    chat bots).

    I think Games::Manager is a good name for this module, because it's
    exactly what it does: manages games! Review the POD data in the
    module for the details on its functionality.
